name: Product Feeder
author: Product Feeder

sections.description: Connect to the marketplace(s) of your choice to increase sales, synchronize orders & returns, rule-based product selection, and much more! Try it now at https://product-feeder.com
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate our plugin.
  2. Create a account at https://product-feeder.com
  3. Create a WordPress WooCommerce source by using the information shown by the plugin
  4. Start connecting the marketplace(s) of your choice!
